vehicles.description: There is a dark-colored sedan in the left lane, slightly ahead of the ego vehicle, and a white SUV further ahead in the right lane.
vehicles.explanation: The sedan may change its speed or switch lanes, which will affect the driving strategy of the ego car. The SUV's trajectory is also important to monitor for safe distance keeping.

traffic cones.description: Orange and white traffic cones are set up on the right side of the right lane, leading up to a lane merge where the cones redirect traffic into the left lane.
traffic cones.explanation: The cones are guiding vehicles to merge from the right to the left lane for road work or an obstruction ahead, so the ego car will need to adjust its lane position accordingly.

barriers.description: A white concrete barrier is positioned on the right side of the ego vehicle, separating the highway from the shoulder or a different roadway.
barriers.explanation: The barrier limits the available space on the right and indicates that there is no option for a right-hand lane change or emergency stopping on a shoulder in this section.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic scene, there is a dark-colored sedan in the left lane, slightly ahead of the ego vehicle, and a white SUV further ahead in the right lane. The presence of the sedan is significant as it may change its speed or switch lanes, potentially affecting the driving strategy of the ego car. It is also crucial to monitor the SUV's trajectory to maintain a safe distance.

Additionally, there are orange and white traffic cones set up on the right side of the right lane, leading to a lane merge where the cones redirect traffic into the left lane. These cones indicate that the ego car will need to adjust its lane position to the left due to road work or an obstruction ahead.

A white concrete barrier is positioned on the right side of the ego vehicle, separating the highway from the shoulder or a different roadway. This barrier limits the available space on the right and signifies that there is no option for a right-hand lane change or emergency stopping on a shoulder in this section of the road.

1.description and explanation: This object is a white car traveling ahead of the ego vehicle in the same lane. The presence of this car requires the ego vehicle to maintain a safe following distance to allow for sufficient braking time in case the car ahead decelerates suddenly.

2.description and explanation: This is a traffic barrier situated on the side of the road. It is typically used in construction areas to guide vehicles and protect workers from traffic. The barrier occupies part of the lane, necessitating that vehicles may need to adjust their lane positions slightly to avoid it.

3.description and explanation: This object is a traffic cone, typically used in road scenarios to mark areas that are temporarily prohibited for vehicles or to signal road workers nearby. It is usually bright orange with white horizontal stripes, enhancing visibility. A traffic cone on the road indicates that the driver should remain cautious and might need to merge or change lanes to avoid the restricted area ahead.

driving_suggestion: The ego car should prepare to merge left due to the traffic cones directing traffic in that manner. It should also maintain a safe following distance from the sedan and SUV ahead, monitoring for any changes in their speed or position. The absence of visible traffic signs or lights means that the ego car's driving behavior is primarily influenced by the vehicles and road work ahead. Maintaining vigilance and readiness to adjust speed or lane position is recommended in this scenario.
